statements.select: select 1 as PlaceHolder from ( select ServeManArriveTime as ServeDate,ServeManArriveTime as ArriveTime,ServeManLeaveTime as LeaveTime,OldManName,dbo.FUNC_Tol_GetDictionaryItemName('11013',a.ServeItemB) as ServeItemBName,ServeStationName from Oca_ServiceWorkOrder a where a.ServeManId in( select dbo.FUNC_Oca_GetUserIdByOpenId(OpenId,StationId) from Pub_WXStationAuthRequest where DoStatus=1 and OpenId = #OpenId#) and DoStatus>1 and ServeManArriveTime is not null and ServeManLeaveTime is not null DATEDIFF(d,ServeManArriveTime,#ServeDate#)=0 )x

select x.* from ( select top ($PageNo$*$PageSize$) row_number() over(Order By $OrderByClause$) as SN, ServeManArriveTime as ServeDate,ServeManArriveTime as ArriveTime,ServeManLeaveTime as LeaveTime,OldManName,dbo.FUNC_Tol_GetDictionaryItemName('11013',a.ServeItemB) as ServeItemBName,ServeStationName from Oca_ServiceWorkOrder a where a.ServeManId in( select dbo.FUNC_Oca_GetUserIdByOpenId(OpenId,StationId) from Pub_WXStationAuthRequest where DoStatus=1 and OpenId = #OpenId#) and DoStatus>1 and ServeManArriveTime is not null and ServeManLeaveTime is not null DATEDIFF(d,ServeManArriveTime,#ServeDate#)=0 )x where x.SN > ($PageNo$-1)*$PageSize$

select ServeStationName,ServeItemBName,isnull(ByDay,0) as ByDay,isnull(ByWeek,0) as ByWeek,isnull(ByMonth,0) as ByMonth from ( select dbo.FUNC_Tol_GetDictionaryItemName('11013',a.ServeItemB) as ServeItemBName,ServeStationName, 'ByDay' as Period, Sum(DateDiff(ss,a.ServeManArriveTime,a.ServeManLeaveTime)) as TotalSeconds from Oca_ServiceWorkOrder a where a.ServeManId in(select dbo.FUNC_Oca_GetUserIdByOpenId(OpenId,StationId) from Pub_WXStationAuthRequest where DoStatus=1 and OpenId = #OpenId#) and DoStatus>1 and ServeManArriveTime is not null and ServeManLeaveTime is not null and DATEDIFF(dd,ServeManArriveTime,GETDATE()) = 3 Group By a.ServeStationName,a.ServeItemB union select dbo.FUNC_Tol_GetDictionaryItemName('11013',a.ServeItemB) as ServeItemBName,ServeStationName, 'ByWeek' as Period, Sum(DateDiff(ss,a.ServeManArriveTime,a.ServeManLeaveTime)) as TotalSeconds from Oca_ServiceWorkOrder a where a.ServeManId in(select dbo.FUNC_Oca_GetUserIdByOpenId(OpenId,StationId) from Pub_WXStationAuthRequest where DoStatus=1 and OpenId = #OpenId#) and DoStatus>1 and ServeManArriveTime is not null and ServeManLeaveTime is not null and DATEDIFF(ww,ServeManArriveTime,GETDATE()) = 0 Group By a.ServeStationName,a.ServeItemB union select dbo.FUNC_Tol_GetDictionaryItemName('11013',a.ServeItemB) as ServeItemBName,ServeStationName, 'ByMonth' as Period, Sum(DateDiff(ss,a.ServeManArriveTime,a.ServeManLeaveTime)) as TotalSeconds from Oca_ServiceWorkOrder a where a.ServeManId in(select dbo.FUNC_Oca_GetUserIdByOpenId(OpenId,StationId) from Pub_WXStationAuthRequest where DoStatus=1 and OpenId = #OpenId#) and DoStatus>1 and ServeManArriveTime is not null and ServeManLeaveTime is not null and DATEDIFF(MM,ServeManArriveTime,GETDATE()) = 1 Group By a.ServeStationName,a.ServeItemB ) a pivot( max(TotalSeconds) for Period in(ByDay,ByWeek,ByMonth) ) b
